website_summaries.verdict: Offers reliable construction and style options that competitors can't beat, making them among the best aviators available today.
pros: A classic style by a popular name in eyewear
Offers gradient lenses and durable metal frames
cons: They are a bit on the higher end of the price range, but it's what you would expect for the quality

customer_reviews.title: These are not authentic Ray Ban shades.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I was purchasing authentic Ray Ban shades until they cracked. While trying to replace the lens I found out they are fake. They are probably the closest replica I’ve seen but it angers me that I paid exactly what real Ray Ban shades cost.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE- 5 big stars
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful!! I am in love. These are bronze with pink gradient. They arrived quickly & are definitely authentic. I suggest if you're concerned to only buy from Amazon. I agonized over the sizes- 55, 58 & 62mm. 62 is mostly for men. 55 is for petite faces. 58 is standard/medium. From experience, the only thing worse than too big is too small. The 58 is perfect!!! I own polarized glasses. These aren't, which is fine. I read the UV protection isn't as good on polarized. Polarized is meant for glare- ie: out on the water
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the quality of these sunglasses. The description says large, but the lens of these are actually quite small. When I’m wearing them you can see my entire eyebrow, and I have a small to average size face. I like my sunglasses to provide a little more coverage. The lenses do jot provide much sun protection either. They are extremely thin and delicate. I don’t wear them because I am afraid they will break easily. The only good thing about these sunglasses is that they look beautiful, but are not sturdy or functional.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So i made this purchase unexpectedly. My fiance and I were working on his great aunt car when his old pair of Ray-Bans were passed to me, in which I proceed to place them on the hood of my fiances truck! He gets in the truck without realized where I had placed his glasses and to make a long story short, they didn't survive! So i bought his a new pair, which was this pair. I absolutely love them! These are even better than the old golden aviators that were lost. f you're looking to change it up, buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Potter

customer_reviews.title: Love my Ray Bans!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great! Real Ray Bans! I bought them for my trip to Colombia this January and never wanted to take them off. They’re lightweight and comfortable and are a great brand at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, great style, not to big & not pink!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, great style, not to big. I was worried they would be big glasses (not a fan), but they are not too big. Actually kind of smaller, but I like them. Perfect size for me. But they are NOT pink at all. More gold/brown gradient, but still cute and I like them. I previously purchased a "cheap" pair of aviators on here, but they were not as comfortable as these. I'm happy with my purchase. (My first Raybans)
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shades. I bought the light blue Gradient aviators. The 3025 model is the SMALL size -55. I watched a youtube video on how to tell if your glasses are fake and these seem to be the real deal. I brought them in to Ray Ban for a fitting and they did not say they were fake so ...Ya! The price is great. I have no complaints. I included a picture so you can see the color. I get compliments on them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tantillo-Reddoch

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, but do your research
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy Ray bans from Amazon, but i did my research and learned that Amazon is an authorized retailer of the product. Make sure Amazon is listed as the seller of the exact size/color/model you want before you purchase. That way, if what you order arrives in any way less than wha t you expect, you are protected. I bought the gold/blue gradient and they are perfect! I saved over $40 too!
customer_reviews.author: LizS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ray Bans and have had quite a few pairs over the last few years. The most recent ones I had I felt didn’t fit my face all that well (and my 1yr old bent the frames) so I was in the market for some new ones... I did the credit card measure test and ordered a smaller size and they fit perfectly!!! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: cmoney

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love.....
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair because I loved them so much but broke a lens. Love the gradient blue color. I get tons of compliments when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee C

customer_reviews.title: ... hard to find ray band that fit and look good on your face unless you go to a store ...
customer_reviews.text: it is hard to find ray band that fit and look good on your face unless you go to a store that sells them so you can know your fit and size then order them from Amazon if you want otherwise you will be buying and returning a lot till you get right size i tried that with my son . but they are nice very very thin sides can break easily was very surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stylish option for smaller faces
customer_reviews.text: These are a good option for narrower faces. They have a nice classic style, with updated frame colors and lens options. The gradient blue provides moderate sun protection for your eyes, but possibly not enough for bright glare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Lovely GOLD RayBans
customer_reviews.text: Read the description. I did not understand the description correctly. I wanted rose gold frames, but these are gold frames, with rose gold lenses. The frame is a very thin wire, but it seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: kLa Treon

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ray-bans
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for the wife, she loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Riubens

customer_reviews.title: My wife didn't like them. She took them to the local retailer ...
customer_reviews.text: I am almost certain these are a knockoff. The logo didn't match the ones in the store. They felt cheap and had some side by side differences with ones I knew were real. My wife didn't like them. She took them to the local retailer who also said they believed them to be knockoffs. She did say that they do not always look the same so it could just be the model we had but they just didn't feel the same. We ended up returning then and buying the pair in the store. I gave them a 2 because I can't swear they are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not too big. Durable. Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Most sunnies are too big for my face so the “classics” are great. The lenses are not too dark. They are very pretty. Light weight but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute! I’m still not sure if I like them for me because they are completely different from my normal style. Only complaint is that the box was obviously used before. Otherwise, I really like them and may keep them!
customer_reviews.author: KathyJorge Astorquiza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look and style
customer_reviews.text: I ove this "Sunglasses", and yes i put the "" on purpose cause this Glasses are good for the style and nice look but not so good for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Hebert J. Sanchez G.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ray-Bans for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They are advertised as rose colored lens; actual lens color is rose with slight brown tint. I purchased from Amazon (not 3rd party seller). Glasses arrived in original vendor packaging, with case, cleaning wipe, and official product certification. Several reviewers noted that some Ray-Bans are now made in China; this particular style was made in Italy. Overall very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NYCKimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shades
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time, did not really know what they meant when they said 'Polarized' any dark shades would do. So when I got this I put them to the test under the Kenyan Sun and they are amazing no squinting in the midday sun and most important is the reduced need to have to remove them when indoors. Like I Said I LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Kamuyu

customer_reviews.title: The real deal..... Paris Miki Optical.
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research I purchased my Ray Ban shades from Paris Miki Optical. This is a legitimate seller selling authentic products. No fakes here, BUY WITH CONFIDENCE. Great price, quick delivery and well packed, AND customer service that is actually better than Amazon's. Cannot say enough good stuff about these guys, they bent over backwards to help me out on my order. I wish all the sellers here on Amazon measured up to the standard set by Paris Miki Optical. I'm no shill just a very happy customer. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: They Are Fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these and they're as pictured. I looked around for months and did not want to spend $160. Searched Amazon and found the perfect price. I wasted no time ordering. I will have to say this, ladies be mindful that these are for men because it's a little loose fitting on me and will try to see if I can have them tighten to fit better. No regrets in purchasing thes aviator.
customer_reviews.author: SoleCollector

customer_reviews.title: 100% authentic
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!! 100% authentic! I'm a very happy customer! This is my first pair of ray-ban sunglasses. I will never go back to the 20.00 cheapest sunglasses, I can find. They protect my eyes and i can actually see in the sun!!
customer_reviews.author: Kombat Kim

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a pair of Ray Ban Aviator sunglasses, but hesitated to buy them for a couple of reasons...one being the price. I'm so glad I found these on Amazon at the price I paid. You can't beat the deal. AND...they fit great! I wasn't sure what size to get but after reading another review, opted for the 58mm and they fit perfect. They're gorgeous sunglasses. I purchased the gold frames with gradient lenses and I love them. I'm so glad I decided to buy them. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: M. Reaux

customer_reviews.title: Always kept them protected in a case in my purse ...
customer_reviews.text: Always kept them protected in a case in my purse, yet somehow the lens popped out while I was wearing them, fell to the floor and shattered to bits. Also, the "rb" on the front corner rubbed off within the first days of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Valdovinos

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four pairs of these sunglasses in my life, and will continue to purchase them! They are comfortable, provide great sun protection, and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban Review
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Ray Bans!!! Hit or miss when you order online but definitely happy with these. They fit perfect and look fab!!! You can get rayban chart online guys and measure with debit/credit card to help pick your size. Happy shopping!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Crushed RB box
customer_reviews.text: They went on sale two days after I bought them for $30.00 cheaper. The official Ray Ban box was crushed which for a collector is a “no no”.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This one is the perfect size. The only thing that I don't like ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of small aviator sunglasses and first tried a different RayBan aviator glasses but it was too small even for my petite face. This one is the perfect size. The only thing that I don't like is that the arms seem to be just a tad too long so when I look down, the sunglasses slide down or in some cases, they slip out and fall which could be annoying but it may just need an adjustment. Overall, I like the sunglasses and the size of the lens fit very well and the look is very RayBan classic.
customer_reviews.author: andr0meda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and style
customer_reviews.text: My wife is obsessed with these glasses. They are more of a light gold than pink tint. Definitely scored some points for ordering these! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal from "Amazon.com"
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews here and decided if I was going to order these I would do it from Amazon directly and not a re-seller. These glasses showed up quickly and are the real deal.....not a pair of replicas. They were significantly cheaper than the mall retailer and I couldn't be happier with the purchase! Again, I made sure I ordered a pair "shipped and sold" by Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!  Don't waste your time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to open the Amazon box today! Thought I was getting a cool pair of aviator shades!!! However, disappointment was what I got instead. (see photos) Cheap plastic pink frames!!! Not sure this is a true Ray Ban distributor or even authentic Ray Ban's!!! Already have the return label printed......Hope this helps anyone else thinking of buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Genuine and fat delivery here!
customer_reviews.text: The product was purchased a a birthday gift for a best friend of mine and I was extremely pleased with the quality and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Neelie

customer_reviews.title: cool sunglasses, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: i'm happy with these sunglasses, and the TIMES NYC rep was super great (these were the 2nd pair i purchases; didn't like the first and was able to return and get refund w/o issue). i will just say, h/e, that the pair i REALLY wanted were the 55 or 56mm caravans, but the frame and lens color selections offered by the manufacturer were really limited. so this is a plea to ray ban: PLEASE offer the caravans in silver frames w/ grey crystal lenses! all the other lenses are too dark or mirrored (yuck--feel like a highway patrolman). crystal lenses nicely cut the glare w/o putting you in total darkness.
customer_reviews.author: c.s.lee

customer_reviews.title: Fakes
customer_reviews.text: Fakes. I was replacing the exact model that I had bought on REVOLVE. Completely not the same quality. Totally lacking the ray-Ban quality and integrity and style. Don’t even bother. Buy them at Ray ban website or in store at a sunglasses or department store. Especially when you’re paying $168... You deserve to have the real thing. It’s way better than what I got, and I tried a replacement too and it was the same crap.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product and box were both opened when i received it. The item in the box is not raybans and i had to send this back. Same experience in the other box too.
customer_reviews.author: Divesh

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Ban Rb3025 Classic Gradient Aviator Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Sure, they're nice enough. Not the best value, but whatevers.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua of NYC

customer_reviews.title: This is a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: I asked that UPS pick up these sunglasses and I ordered another pair. I could NOT exchange because I couoldn't give the number for the glasses I wanted, I paid $6 for UPS to pick up the first order but he left a mailing slip and left. I still have the glasses. AND yes, 3 people were here all day and nobody heard the doorbell. I am not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wincy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I got the 55mm size. I didn't like the looks of the larger set. These are by far the best set of sunglasses I've owned!
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: Love Raybans
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great for sun protection plus super stylist. I have two pairs of these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are real. They look cheaper than the ones I bought at the sunglasses hut.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Leave them all for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy them until they stop making them. The clarity is perfect. They are light framed and stylish. They are very thin so be careful but it’s an amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: var

customer_reviews.title: Amazon shipped me an empty box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a very nice cloth to clean sunglasses, as well as a little booklet. All packaged nicely in a ray ban box....but...I did not receive actual sunglasses. The box was empty!!! Someone is wearing my aviators. I had to cut it open...so I can only assume its someone in the Amazon warehouse. I want my money back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion M Devoe Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Only okay
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy feeling and I can't get them to sit straight. I don't think I'm happy with these glasses and question if they're possibly counterfeit; Clearly that's a risk I chose to take when ordering online. I can't bend my face down to read a book without them sliding down the bridge of my,nose. Over all, I am disappointed but will have to make due as I don't want to spend the money for Maui Jim glasses right now.
customer_reviews.author: JulieH2O

customer_reviews.title: Grate looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: For out doors in general. I like the looks and the color blue contrast with the gold. Nice looking glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria graves

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this company zero stars, I would! I ordered The Ray Ban Aviators as a gift. They were Prime, and I was psyched. Today, they came in the mail, I was super Excited to look at them. I took Off the plastic wrapping, opened the big white box, and inside was a surprisingly light ray ban silver box. I opened It, and realized why it was so light... it was totally empty!! They didn’t put any glasses in it at all. A total scam!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for my wife and she loves them! The sunglasses are very stylish and my wife gets compliments about them very often. The glasses do a wonderful job of protecting the sun from her eyes. These glasses are unisex so I can wear them too. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the sunglasses, but too small for me and I even have flat nose bridge (Asian😄) . It fit my 9 y/o son perfectly. I give it a 5 Stars, it's not the products fault. I hope I still can return it for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Ensure you have the right size or pay for return shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am quite sure I ordered a standard sized (58mm) rayban but when it came in, it was really small and looks more like a 55mm small sized rayban. What's worst is when I requested for a return, seems like Fashion Depot wanted me to pay for shipping. I only wanted to return because I wanted a bigger sized one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: see through mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are really pretty and the colour is exactly as described but they are totally see through and only look mirrored in direct sunglight. I totally thought it would be total mirror so much so that the wearer's eyes wouldn't be visible. A bit disappointed but they are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great sunnies at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sold and ship by Amazon and they are awesome! 100% authentic and very nicely packed!nordis is selling the these exact sunnies for over $40 more so Amazon price was great! These are a very subtle pink so if you are looking for some colored sunglasses but not super trendy or "on your face" color these are perfect plus they add a feminine touch .Since I have Asian shape face aviators don't look good on me but these are the perfect size,they're oversize but not super big but I can see they may be big for and average face, overall very happy ! Thank you Amazon for another great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these a lot, but I don't love them.
customer_reviews.text: Gradient lense shade is almost unnoticable compared to the picture. Also, there's a hazy film on the inside of the lenses that I have not been able to get off. The film is not noticable when I have them on, but when I take them off, they look really dirty. If I knew what I knew now, I wouldn't buy them. However, since I own them now, I'll continue to use them for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: Not pink but I like them
customer_reviews.text: Not quite pink like I was expecting....Moreso brown. But they are cute
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Original Ray Ban with great gradient and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Original Ray Ban Aviators. It's light weight and has superb gradient. Comes with the hard cover/pouch. Of course this one is not polarized. Gradient sunglasses never come in polarized lenses. Do keep checking the price and don't waste money buying the same from Sunglass hut or Lenscrafters or those pricey stores. Amazon has the original ones at lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: The worst material
customer_reviews.text: The worst material & very poor the size not accurate as shown the color very poor & bad you are cheating people You’re responsible to refund me the fully money
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect surprise
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit bigger than I had anticipated but after putting them on for a few minutes I just fell in love with them. Really really really like the color of the lenses. Perfect for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Glasses, Fake case...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit great! The glasses appear to be authentic. However, the case that came with them doesn't. This is the second pair that I've bought from NY Fashion LTD. The first pair were too small so I sent them back. The case and glasses were authentic on my first order. Not sure what happened on this order.
customer_reviews.author: Fabien J.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: These will never ever go out of style and they look great on everyone! I’m happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. But I need to have them properly fitted to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Stone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are the exact same sunglasses you would pay over $100 for at a local retailer. They came in a nice Ray-Ban hard case with a cleaning cloth. Brand new as if I had just left the mall with them. I won't buy sunglasses from the mall ever again! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Just add beach to these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! But I wanted more of a mirror finish. Wasn’t sure from the pictures. 55 fit my face nice.
customer_reviews.author: R~

customer_reviews.title: FAKE RAYBANS. POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: The lens popped out of the frame multiple times within 8 days of owning them. And of course it happened the day after my trial period for Amazon wardrobe was up. Poor quality, very thin frames, NOT real Raybans. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: abby e

customer_reviews.title: They look pretty sharp and a lot nicer than the ones that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought directly from Amazon and the lens have the correct "RB" watermark on the right lens. I read in the comments that some of the products from other sellers did not, so be careful of authenticity depending on what seller you get these from. They look pretty sharp and a lot nicer than the ones that have been handled by a bunch of customers at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of ripoffs.
customer_reviews.text: Completely NOT RayBans. No case or anything in the box but a 3 dollar pair of gas station Elton John Glasses. I requested a replacement which came in correctly but to small (my fault) so they went back as well. Let’s hope I get refunded the original and they don’t put the blame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the same exact glasses. I love them! Had to buy a new pair after a year because I dropped my first pair on the street and the lenses got scratched so I'm trying really hard to take care of these. The case that comes with it is a true Ray-Ban case, but it is the fake leather cheap brown one so I suggest picking up a hard case for added protection. Other than the flimsy case, these glasses are awesome and shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wittenberg

customer_reviews.title: Received with scratch on the frame and glass
customer_reviews.text: Two pairs ordered, one pair arrived only. That pair arrived with scratch on the frame and glass. Same glasses were ordered last year and in good order.
customer_reviews.author: Stabile Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these! I'm a small person so these fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these! I'm a small person so these fit great and don't look goofy on my face. Plus I love that these aren't heavy or flimsy and that they look gorgeous with everything. The tint on them is great too! It's great for every day use
customer_reviews.author: kortney

customer_reviews.title: ... If they are original or not but they are nice. I had previously an original pair and cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea If they are original or not but they are nice. I had previously an original pair and cannot tell the diference...they are light and fit well...I should have gone, though, for the 58mm instead of the 55 but they are very nice...the only thing I noticed a bit diferent from the picture is that they are not light blue they are a bit darker than the pic but they are fine anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Prud'homme

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Love the fit. Love the look. This is my second pair, as my toddler bent my others. (they are fragile - if they have a fault, but what sunglasses aren't?) I would buy again and again. They are flattering to my face shape... which is a little round.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my face
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses! I lost my first pair and ordered a second pair of the exact same sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stikeleather

customer_reviews.title: Real Ray Bans
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase these, bc I had doubts about their authenticity. These arrived in true Ray Ban packaging, the Ray Ban emblem is printed on the lens, and they came with the Ray Ban look book as well as the lens cleaning cloth. These are definitely real Ray Bans, and they fit great. I got the 58mm, which fit my face perfectly. Real Ray Bans at a great price - I might actually buy a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Soucy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! My husband loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband's birthday... After handling hundreds of the various Ray-Ban styles, including this one at work event, I feel confident that these are authentic! Packaging and Ray-Ban details all were in-line (down to the brochure, eyeglass cleaning cloth, etc.), and they were nicely priced and available quickly through Amazon prime :) I'm very pleased with my purchase, and so was the birthday guy!
customer_reviews.author: wctransplant

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses arrieved in perfect conditions,I was kind of scare because they were shipped to Mexico. The packaging was really good, they arrive one day before they suppose to, which is perfect for me. My sunglasses are just what I expected. Great quality, 100% authentic, really good price. I got the 58 mm..... Love the style!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MVAL

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing.
customer_reviews.text: They are the larger frame. Sometimes they slip off a little bit but no big deal. They look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon as seller = Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been burned buying knock offs before but I made sure the seller was Amazon and these bad boys are the real deal! Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Really great buy on Amazon. Ran into a girl on the street who had the same pair is me, took pictures together modeling for the camera it was hot. The brown lens turn to a darker tint which I happen to like depending on the light. The only downside is that the build quality seems a little poor and they can easily break if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Picture and description do not match. I had to return the item due to the wrong color lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan.Little

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses, look great. Effective in all but direct sunlight in the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: that was really very nice and 100% UV protection, i like it too much and i recommended I am in the middle east now and every one how sun is here :) and this is really help me when i drive , and also the design and materials its a good deal and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alaa

customer_reviews.title: Amazon saves me $ again!
customer_reviews.text: I went and tried on the various sizes of these Aviators before buying online. I received genuine Ray-Ban glasses, in the size I intended to order, and the lenses on the pair I received were manufactured in Italy. I couldn't be happier. Amazon saved me quite a bit off retail price!
customer_reviews.author: Lawyermom

customer_reviews.title: Injustice To The Ray Ban Brand
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as a Birthday gift. They arrived with the right lens cracked in half. Now I have no gift to give tomorrow because the replacement won’t arrive until Monday. I’m sure Ray Ban would also be disappointed to know how their brand is being handled.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Durant

customer_reviews.title: Genuine RAYBAN with brown gradient lenses
customer_reviews.text: Thank God, its genuine RAYBAN. I was a bit worried, reading some of the product reviews. I like the color of this gradient lenses. I have received quite a few complements already. It came in a Black leather usual RayBan box, however, I wish the box could have been brown as it was shown in the picture. Anyway that is not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morshed

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: They were most definitely not pink but I had gotten them as a gift and was out of time so I had to give them as is. They were just the regular brown ones
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, less than retail store.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, less money than retail sunglass store. The inner Ray Ban box was a little beaten up from handling, but the glasses inside were okay. That was the only issue since this product was a gift, and it looked a bit odd when the person unwrapped the package and the box was beaten up and used looking. But the contents inside were obviously new.
customer_reviews.author: John Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not rayban
customer_reviews.text: These were not Rayban and I returned them. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!! Authentic Ray bans. I have a smaller face and these fit me absolutely perfectly! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Libien

customer_reviews.title: I like how they are a lighter shade of brown for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a female and I purchased these and they fit so perfectly. I like how they are a lighter shade of brown for the lenses and they are the smaller style of Ray Bans. I took them into and they are indeed authentic. Just make sure it is being purchased AND shipped from Amazon for authentic pieces.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: My wife love this sunglass
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this sunglass. As soon as she got it, took a self photo to be displayed on facebook. This demonstrate how proude she was when received. This arrive with a very good leather case, which one of the leg covered with a plastic which avoids friction between legs. The lenses arrived without any scratch or bad issues. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Erik K. Narazzaki

customer_reviews.title: Great Look. Weird hinge.
customer_reviews.text: The right hinge is so tight that the glasses do not fold up comfortably. I tried to loosen the screw with no success. Afraid that the way the glasses fit on my face will change because of this. Look AMAZING on though.
customer_reviews.author: Duane & Cat Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I got my pair, I was surprised that (1) it didn't have pink lenses and (2) there is a small chip on the upper right lens of the sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: They were bigger than expected, given the size we ...
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than expected, given the size we chose. Otherwise, the product is legit. It has the laser engravings on the lenses and frames, it has the proper labels and certificate of authenticity. And it was brand new and cheaper than what we could find in stores. Over all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: The box they came in seemed to be old which ...
customer_reviews.text: The box they came in seemed to be old which I did not have a problem with but then when I opened the box and handled the glasses to put them on they were noisy. I found this to be very strange and I think the only rational conclusion here is that they were fake. I’ve never had noisy glasses before and I’m not about to start.
customer_reviews.author: Nick A

customer_reviews.title: Misused packaging, scared it was a return
customer_reviews.text: Should return it but not going to..the package looks used , glasses are ok
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rueda

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Felt compelled to point out that not only are these everything I had hope for and my favorite Christmas present, but they are 100% authentic!
customer_reviews.author: matt palermo

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great!! My order came a day early than expected and I am so pleased with my new sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator Large Metal Non-Polarized Sunglasses,Gunmetal...
customer_reviews.text: Love.These.Sunglasses. I bought them based on reviews. I'm a female 5'6" medium/average sized face and these fit perfectly. As soon as I put them on my face they settled in right away. I really like these and i'm glad I bought them. So 70's retro and cute (yes i'm stuck in 1970-something haha)
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: I m disappointed. I ordered LARGE Aviator Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I will keep them because they were under 100 dollars BUT, I m disappointed. I ordered LARGE Aviator Glasses; the lense is FAR from large, but rather small. I have large features and square jawline , much prefer a larger lense. Remove LARGE from the description and replace with small .
customer_reviews.author: teresa lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I had lost my Ray Bans and these were the perfect replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: JThompson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but heavy glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great looking glasses but too heavy for more than a few minutes of wearing. They created red marks on the bridge of my nose after short wearing time, which led to dark circles around my eyes and a headache. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Boller

customer_reviews.title: I need a pair...
customer_reviews.text: They looked and felt nice. She loved them, that’s all that really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D. Brooks

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic, Silver/ Crystal Grey Gradient, 55 mm
feature_bullets: CLASSIC AVIATOR SUNGLASSES: Protect your eyes with style made famous by aviators since 1937. Ray-Ban RB3025 Large Metal Aviator Sunglasses are superior unisex glasses with multiple frame and lens options.

NON-POLARIZED SUNGLASSES: RB3025 Aviator sunglasses feature legendary Ray-Ban G-15 non-polarized lenses, which provide superior protection against UV light and were originally designed for military use.
100% UV PROTECTION: These stylish sunglasses were made famous by Top Gun. You can feel comfortable knowing that the Ray-Ban lenses will provide 100% UV protection.
UNISEX SUNGLASSES: Whether you’re looking for Ray-Ban sunglasses for women or men, RB3025 Aviators are designed as unisex sunglasses that are durable and fashionable.

MULTIPLE FRAME AND LENS COLORS: With a variety of metal frame colors to choose from, including gold or silver, see the world through a variety of lens colors—all of which provide optimal visual clarity and 100% UV protection.

MULTIPLE SIZE OPTIONS: Choose from a variety of size options including 55mm, 58mm and 62mm. 55mm is recommended for smaller or more narrow faces, while the bigger 62mm is recommended for those with large heads or wide faces. The 58mm the best fit for men with an average width face, and fits the average women's face for a slightly oversized look. Temple Length: 135
CASE & LENS CLOTH INCLUDED: Each pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses come with a case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
VISIT THE RAY-BAN BRAND SHOP: Click on the Ray-Ban logo above to view the entire Ray-Ban brand assortment.
